page.title: 05A Teachers day
page.content: My day begins at 6.30a.m.with my alarm sounding.After washing and dressing,breakfast is eaten,usually while watching'Breakfast T.V.'My breakfast consists of cereal,toast & marmalade and coffee. I leave home between 7.45 & 8.00a.m. and drive to work.My route takes me from{Hemel Hempstead,}along the{A41}to {Hunton Bridge,}then on the{M25}to the {Maple Cross}exit and{A405 & A412}to school.This journey usually sees me arriving at school between 8.15 & 8.30 The children enter at 8.55 and their day begins.This normally starts with assembly(Monday,Tuesday & Friday),then the morning is taken up with fairly formal work(either maths or English). This will involve me in a class discussion outlining what I expect and checking that the children understand their tasks.
